tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE vulnerability_scans (
    scan_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
    scan_date TIMESTAMP,
    scanner_name VARCHAR(50),
    target_ip VARCHAR(15),
    vulnerabilities JSONB
);

CREATE TABLE remediation_actions (
    action_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    scan_id INT,
    action_description TEXT,
    remediation_date DATE,
    FOREIGN KEY (scan_id) REFERENCES vulnerability_scans(scan_id)
);

CREATE TABLE scan_results (
    result_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
    scan_id UUID REFERENCES vulnerability_scans(scan_id),
    weakness_id UUID REFERENCES security_weaknesses(weakness_id),
    severity VARCHAR(20),
    status VARCHAR(20)
);

CREATE TABLE vulnerability_scans (
    id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    report_id INT,
    scan_date DATE,
    vulnerability_description VARCHAR,
    remediation_action VARCHAR
);

CREATE TABLE reports (
    report_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    report_date DATE,
    report_type VARCHAR,
    report_description TEXT
);

CREATE TABLE vulnerabilities (
    vulnerability_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    vulnerability_name VARCHAR,
    severity_level VARCHAR,
    risk_score INT,
    affected_systems TEXT
);

CREATE TABLE security_personnel (
    personnel_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    personnel_name VARCHAR,
    personnel_role VARCHAR,
    department VARCHAR,
    contact_info VARCHAR
);

CREATE TABLE reports (
    report_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    scan_id INT,
    device_id INT,
    vulnerability_id INT,
    report_date DATE,
    FOREIGN KEY (scan_id) REFERENCES vulnerability_scans(scan_id),
    FOREIGN KEY (device_id) REFERENCES devices(device_id),
    FOREIGN KEY (vulnerability_id) REFERENCES vulnerabilities(vulnerability_id)
);

CREATE TABLE remediation_actions (
    action_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    action_description TEXT,
    action_status VARCHAR(20),
    completed_date DATE,
    report_id INT,
    FOREIGN KEY (report_id) REFERENCES reports(report_id)
);
